程序包 us.codecraft.webmagic.selector

接口 ElementSelector

  • 所有已知实现类:
    BaseElementSelector, CssSelector, LinksSelector, XpathSelector

    public interface ElementSelector
    Selector(extractor) for html elements.
    从以下版本开始:
    0.3.0
    作者:
    code4crafter@gmail.com

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法 说明
      String select​(org.jsoup.nodes.Element element)
      Extract single result in text.
      If there are more than one result, only the first will be chosen.
      List<String> selectList​(org.jsoup.nodes.Element element)
      Extract all results in text.

    • 方法详细资料

      • select

        String select​(org.jsoup.nodes.Element element)
        Extract single result in text.
        If there are more than one result, only the first will be chosen.
        参数:
        element - element
        返回:
        result

      • selectList

        List<String> selectList​(org.jsoup.nodes.Element element)
        Extract all results in text.
        参数:
        element - element
        返回:
        results
